column1: 321213,Motorcycle Mechanic,,"Replace or repair non-engine automotive or vehicle components
column3: Replace worn, damaged or defective mechanical parts
column5: Adjust vehicle components according to specifications
column7: Disassemble equipment to inspect for deficiencies
column9: Inspect vehicles to determine overall condition
column13: Confer with customers or users to assess problems
column15: Observe equipment in operation to detect potential problems
column17: Assemble mechanical components or machine parts
column19: Test mechanical equipment to ensure proper functioning
column21: Repair defective engines or engine components
column23: Disassemble equipment for maintenance or repair
column33: Remove dents from equipment, materials tools or structures",0.1831701975577308
